input: Send a comprehensive batch request to gather all payment balances and agreements for UUIDs with a specific lifecycle status.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractProlongationRequests?$filter=LifeCycleStatusCode eq '5'&$select=LoanContractPaymentPlanPlannedBalanceAmount,LoanContractPaymentPlanActualBalanceAmount&$expand=TermAgreements,IncomingPaymentAgreements HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
